metadata.name: Digital Derivative #1/9
metadata.description: 'Digital Derivative' is a LiMiTED EDiTiON artwork created by CONNiE DiGiTAL in collaboration with "I'M NEW HERE." Directed by Dan Sickles and produced by dpop Studios, "I'M NEW HERE" is a documentary film and NFT collection capturing the transformative power of CryptoArt. This piece is derived from CONNiE's original 1/1 avatar created for the NEW HERE universe.
